description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. title: How an IIT Kanpur alumnus is using real-time AI systems to fix India's vehicle repair ecosystem
description: Vehicle breakdowns in India often cause confusion and delay. Lakshya Khurana's startup, Ride N Repair, is changing this. The company uses artificial intelligence to coordinate repairs in real-time. This system-driven platform aims to bring predictability and transparency to a sector that has long lacked structure. Ride N Repair connects customers, mechanics, and operations through a single intelligence layer.
